files.description: Project configuration defining build system, package metadata, dependencies, and pytest settings for CI/CD-friendly execution.
Documentation explaining how to run the entrypoint via python -m <package>.run and what artifacts are produced in outputs/.
Package initializer exposing the public API version and ensuring the package is importable.
Core pipeline implementation that deterministically creates outputs/ and writes required artifact files including a JSON report.
Module entrypoint supporting python -m minipipe.run to execute the pipeline and exit with appropriate status for CI.
Pytest suite that runs the pipeline and asserts outputs/ contains expected files and required JSON schema keys.
GitHub Actions workflow to run tests on pushes and pull requests as a minimal CI/CD setup.

missionDescription: Create a minimal package layout + entrypoint (python -m <package>.run) that writes outputs/, then add tests/test_pipeline.py asserting files exist and (optionally) JSON schema keys match.
missionSuccessCriteria: Complete strategic task identified by Meta-Coordinator or escalated by Strategic Tracker
